lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy will play at this year's French Open rather than the WGC-Bridgestone Invitational, saying it will serve as better preparation for the British Open at Troon.

headline.print_headline: Rory McIlroy to Play French Open Instead of Bridgestone
headline.main: Rory McIlroy to Play French Open Instead of Bridgestone

snippet: Rory McIlroy will play at this year's French Open rather than the WGC-Bridgestone Invitational, saying it will serve as better preparation for the British Open at Troon....
